channel.title: CVE Feed for Sophos -- Intercept X Advanced
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sophos -- Intercept X Advanced

item.title: CVE-2021-25269|2024-08-03T19:56:11.071Z -- sophos -- intercept%20x%20advanced
item.description: A local administrator could prevent the HMPA service from starting despite tamper protection using an unquoted service path vulnerability in the HMPA component of Sophos Intercept X Advanced and Sophos Intercept X Advanced for Server before version 2.0.23, as well as Sophos Exploit Prevention before version 3.8.3.
